about_the_game:
Welcome to the Island
Here you'll find many puzzles awaiting you, for this island holds many secrets most of which are yet to be discovered!

Why would you ever play this game?
Well because:

  • Intriguing puzzles

  • Japanese aesthetic

  • Chill vibes

  • High-quality music

Gameplay? what gameplay?
You start off with a fishing rod, with this fishing rod you can pull objects in place to finish the puzzles that get increasingly more difficult. The goal is to bring the bubble to the portal to activate the new level.

Wait but what about the character?In this game you'll play as Hayato, an overworked Japanese businessman that's on the island for 1 reason: finding his lost luck!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8365U Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX150
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
